name: firebase-cloudflare-next-capacitor
description: the template project using firebase, cloudflare, nextjs and capacitor
author: naoji3x <naoji.3x@gmail.com>

scripts.init:all: npm run tf:init && npm run gc:init
scripts.gc:logout: (cd scripts/terraform && gcloud auth application-default revoke && gcloud auth revoke)
scripts.tf:fb:plan:dev: npm run tf:fb:init && (cd scripts/terraform/firebase && terraform plan -var-file=development.tfvars)
scripts.tf:fb:apply:dev: npm run tf:fb:init && (cd scripts/terraform/firebase && terraform apply -var-file=development.tfvars)
scripts.tf:cf:plan: npm run tf:cf:init && (cd scripts/terraform/cloudflare && terraform plan -var-file=development.tfvars -var-file=env.tfvars)
scripts.tf:cf:apply: npm run tf:cf:init && (cd scripts/terraform/cloudflare && terraform apply -var-file=development.tfvars -var-file=env.tfvars)
scripts.clean:modules: rm -rf node_modules apps/frontend/node_modules apps/firebase/functions/node_modules apps/firebase/node_modules apps/capacitor/node_modules
scripts.install:all: npm i -w apps/firebase/functions -w apps/frontend -w apps/firebase -w apps/capacitor && npm i
